thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Andrey Russia
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Andrey Russia

author: Andrey Russia
title: Andrey Russia
text: Hello! I am Andrey and live in Russia! I decided to order the goods on the Banggood website. I ordered a quadrocopter. Three days later I realized that I made a mistake and ordered not what I need. I thought I would not get the money back and it's already late. I sent a request to banggood. I immediately wrote an employee named Cherry. She reacted with understanding to my problem, very quickly answered and helped me. I was very surprised and glad of her professional work. After I get the money back, I'll order on the site banggood is already exactly what I want to buy. About this company I have a very positive opinion. I will always make purchases from them and recommend my friends. Thanks to the banggood and especially the collaboration of Cherry.
